message: My turn. Let's be reasonable, this offer prevents significant losses for both of us due to inflation.
Counter offer, I'm being generous considering inflation hits you harder
This is a fair deal, Alice.  We're losing money fast, and this split ensures we both benefit more than further stalling.
You're losing more to inflation, this is a better split for both
Alice, let's stop this.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this stand-off.  Any more delays and the inflation will rob us both.
